description: Forest Department - Order to declare Siyambalawewa Forest in Awudangawa and Kandalama Wewa Forest in Kandala (part) and Kumbukkadanwela, Dambulla D/S Division, Matale District as Reserved Forests - Wantokkawa Forest in Ehelape and Beraliya Galenda Forest in Kiyaduwa, Akuressa D/S Division, Matara District as Conservation Forests - Welihela Forest in Dombagahawela, Siyambalanduwa D/S Division, Moneragala District as a Conservation Forest - Rekewula Forest in Elagamuwa and Udangare Kanda Forest in Madahapola Kanda, Polpitigama D/S Division, Kurunegala District as Reserved Forests
